bio: A yogi. An acro yogi. A yoga teacher. A mother of two beautiful girls. Seattle based. Greece 🇬🇷 retreat Sept 24-Oct 1, ‘19 robinmargomartin@gmail.com

posts.caption: King dancer. 💗 There are lots of different variations of raja natarajasana. For me, the deeper I go, the more solid my balance becomes. There’s a lot of warm up before I’m ready to move into the full variation on the left. Hip flexor and hamstring openers, shoulder stretches, spinal mobility movements. There’s no need to do a full split here - it feels good in my body, so I like to take it to my edge, whatever that is at that moment. The strap is such a wonderful prop to assist with the grip. It helps open the shoulders as well as deepen the stretch in the standing leg and frontal hip. I can’t fully straighten my top leg with my hands on my foot, and the strap gives me the space I need to work into the needle shape. 💗 Loving the rosewood color from the @aloyoga holiday collection. 😊 Oh! And if you feel like shopping before the madness of Black Friday, I’m giving you exclusive early-access to @aloyoga’s Black Friday sale. Take 30% off full-priced items (this includes their new holiday line). Just head to their site & use code: INSTA30 to shop! #yoga #aloyoga #beagoddess #yogatutorial #tutorial #flexible #flexibility #balance #strong #yogateacher #yogastudent #progressnotperfection #practicenotperfection #yogaprops #yogastrap #asana #namaste

Dancing in the rain. 💗 This is one of my favorite shots from last weekend’s shoot with @sfreneenyc. I happened into this pose by accident over the summer (I was going for a bind, just not like this). As I moved into it then, it was awkward and was a struggle. I kept losing my balance as soon as I found my fingers connect. Eventually, it all came together briefly. A few months later and I’ve found my breath and stability here. I love the lines and how they intersect with the curves. 💗 Wearing all rosewood by @aloyoga 😊 📸 by @sfreneenyc 😘 #yoga #dancer #dance #natarajasana #balance #breathe #flexible #fall #fallcolors #woods #pnw #pnwwonderland #pacificnorthwest #rain #seattle #seattlerain #igyoga #igfitness #photography #yogaphotography #aloyoga #beagoddess

Feeling supported. 💗 When I’m outside, my yoga shapes are often inspired by the landscape - rocks, trees, sand - whatever’s around. This huge tree had beautiful curves and I was trying to emulate them, but it didn’t really work out, so I started to move around in ways that felt good, feeling the solid tree up against me, supporting my movements. 💗 📸 by the talented @sfreneenyc 😘🙏🏻 Wearing all Rosewood by @aloyoga 💗 #yoga #fall #pnw #pnwonderland #seattle #tree #support #prop #flexible #strong #igyoga #instayoga #yogaphotography #getoutside #optoutside #namaste

The perfect fit. ♥️ I remember the first time I did this handstand split across this bridge. It scared me - this is a suspension bridge and it moves when you move. I remember wanting to get out of the pose as fast as I got in it. It didn’t take long for me to change my mindset about the whole experience. Instead of fearing the movement, I felt it. Breathed it. Enjoyed it. And now I look forward to it. ♥️ Thanks for your mad camera skills, @nicolewildcollective ♥️😘 Wearing @aloyoga always. 😊 #yoga #balance #bridge #suspensionbridge #pnw #fallvibes #pnwonderland #breathe #strong #aligned #splits #handstand #red #festive #letgo #aloyoga #beagoddess #yogaphotography

Progress. ♥️ I love coming across old videos and revisiting the same sequences or poses today. Over time, I have gained a much better understanding of movement and breath, how to find some ease in the effort. Minimizing the movement and finding a lot more control. Getting my hips as high above my shoulders as possible as I approach the pose means eliminating the hop to find the balance - and more control in the balance. This isn’t the end of this path - there’s always room to refine and grow. ♥️ Wearing @aloyoga in today’s video. 😊 #yoga #yogavideo #yogatutorial #progress #progressnotperfection #practicenotperfection #yogastudent #yogateacher #balance #growth #path #nodestination #asana #namaste

Taking flight. ♥️ I’ve been getting outside as much as possible lately, soaking up the fall colors and cooler temps. Yesterday wasn’t so pretty and pleasant, and the studio was warm and cozy. @nicolewildcollective set up some studio lighting and we had a blast playing around in the comfort of the indoors. Flying in @aloyoga and @toesox ♥️ 📸 by @nicolewildcollective 😘 #yoga #yogaphotography #photography #balance #breathe #fly #fun #play #strong #koundinyasana #studio #props #crotchshot #lol #asana #namaste

Thanks for the lift, @joeyarrigo! 💗 Partner poses are my favorites - working with someone else involves trust and communication and results in some of the most beautiful shapes. Its especially fun when your partner happens to be ridiculously talented and creative and willing to let you dress him in a matching outfit. 😊💗 Thinking about you Joey! We are both wearing everything nectar by @aloyoga. Alo is moving into the final hours of a huge Black Friday sale. It’s an honor to work with a company that gives back. This year, a portion of all proceeds from @aloyoga’s Black Friday Sale will help bring yoga and mindfulness to 2-million schoolkids! Yoga and mindfulness can change the trajectory of lives and, through sharing these practices with our future leaders we have the ability to inspire the next generation, we can all build a better future together! 💗 Thanks for this capture @charlottesumian 😘😘 #aloyoga #beagoddess #partneryoga #trust #communication #strength #art #lift #breathe #dance #acro #acroyoga #igyoga #igfitness #twinning #cirquedusoleil #volta

Right up the middle. ♥️ Trying hard fo pretend my leg is one of the trees. 😆 The fall is starting to feel a little wintery around here - a lovely time of year in the PNW, but a lovely time to get out of the PNW. Follow me along on some of my upcoming adventures - planning some fun ones! Maybe take class with me in NYC at @alonewyork the first week of December?? ♥️ Photo captured by the incredibly talented @nicolewildcollective 😘 Wearing black cherry by @aloyoga ♥️ #yoga #pnwonderland #pnw #flexible #wheel #wheelpose #fall #winteryoga #gratitude #yogateacher #yogastudent #balance #downhill #fitness #optoutside #getoutside #breathe #aloyoga #beagoddess

Finding grace in the grit. ♥️ Slowly working to deepen the splits. The slight lift of the front leg and bending of the back knee intensifies the stretch. I contract on the inhale, soften on the exhale, always working to balance strength and flexibility. ♥️ Wearing pristine by @aloyoga in a less than pristine location 😉😘 📸 by @jesannayoga 🙏🏻 #yoga #splits #hanumanasana #breathe #balance #soft #strong #concrete #yogateacher #yogastudent #goslow #igyoga #igfitness #seattle #asana #namaste #stretch #aloyoga #beagoddess

Shades of fall. 💛 I’ve had a deeper appreciation for fall this year. I’m definitely a summer chaser but am loving all the fall feels. The colors, the crisp cool air, the dark nights and warm comfort foods. Oh, and coats and boots too because they’re my favorite. 😊💛 Love this fall capture by the super talented @nicolewildcollective 😘 Wearing my new favorite fall color Tuscan Sun by @aloyoga ☀️#yoga #fall #fallcolors #leaves #stretch #flexible #breathe #pnw #pacificnorthwest #pnwwonderland #getoutside #optoutside #practicedaily #aloyoga #balance #beagoddess #instayoga #igyoga #asana #namaste

Gratitude. ♥️ Big open heart today - thankful for all the things. Family, friends - connections and relationships old and new. I’m grateful to each and every one of you who has joined me on this journey. ♥️ Happy Thanksgiving! 💛🍁😘 📸 by the beautiful and talented @nicolewildcollective @nicolewild_photo ♥️ Lost in the clouds wearing ‘cloud’ by @aloyoga ☁️💙 #yoga #thanksgiving #aloyoga #clouds #flexible #openheart #stretch #love #seattle #pnw #sculpture #infinite #circle #circles #gratitude #grateful #beagoddess #namaste

So much fun with this one. ♥️💛 @nicolewildcollective - both an amazing yogi and photographer and all around human - was taking my photo yesterday in this spot doing various poses. I was excited to take her here, to one of my favorite places in the PNW to play. A stranger approached us and asked if she could take our photo. Without much thought, we took advantage of the bridge and our similar sizes and flexibility and stacked ourselves. Unplanned, unexpected and I just love it. Thanks so much to @rebskosh for being so friendly and offering to take our photo and doing such a beautiful job with Nicole’s camera. 😊🙏🏻 We are both feeling the fall in @aloyoga ♥️ #yoga #friendship #fall #fallcolors #pnw #pnwonderland #flexible #strong #nature #suspensionbridge #balance #breathe #beautiful #pacificnorthwest #play #fun #fly #aloyoga #beagoddess
